description:
In a mysterious place, a Mamodo stands above the symbol of a book and announces a message, to the contestants of the Mamodo battle, to assemble at the light.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Isekai Kara no Koe! Meiun Tsukita Mamono-tachi!
The Voice from the Strange World! The Fate of the Demons!
異世界からの声! 命運つきた魔物たち!
